text: Ah position absolute does the trick, thanks <@U38EZFVFE>
I would use JavaScript to change the title attribute in the page and append the blog title if its not there
this has probably been asked, but can one loop through blog topics and add the result to a choice field in a custom module?
so client can choose which topics to display on site
i just discovered the tag field in the cm.  :face_palm:
Why do I get this error : 'Error:8:17'custom_widget' is disabled in this context'
What are the contexts where we can or can't use {% module " " %} ?
you can't use `{% module %}` on custom modules basically. So for example you can't use it neither in the blog content (because its a module too)
@here is anyone having issues with the default blog hubl?, i’m getting this “cannot resolve property” my featured images aren’t showing up on the blog even though they are set within the blog post?
You can safely ignore those warnings. We’ll remove them soon.
Thanks Jeff, will I be able to see the featured images again once the issue has been resolved? I’m seeing this in other portals as well
This might be a real dumb question and it's somewhere obvious, but is there a way to turn off autocompletion of closing HTML tags in the Design Manager? I want to close my own tags! :anguished:

yes and no

If you have access to the developer settings(beta)

There is a feature called “auto close tags” you can turn off/on.

If you don’t have access and want access to the beta, ask for it and if the HS devs are feeling benevolent you may get access. Otherwise I think the feature is coming to everyone semi-soon.
Thanks <@U7SL518D6>. Where do I ask for access to the beta? Here?  ```I am officially requesting access to the developer beta please```
lol what?

for this one, I think the appropriate person is: <@U22PNRAJD>

be aware there may be bugs, it is a beta(though I haven’t really noticed any) and do give them feedback if you have any.
Thanks, will do. <@U22PNRAJD> Shawn would love access to the beta version if possible please.
he means the dev settings beta
This doesn’t affect anything other than show warnings when validating HubL in the design manager
